caption:
We present to you: The newest addition to our DJS ROBOCON 2023-24 family!

Welcome to the team! We now look forward to a great collaboration with the recruits where we all make a move towards exploring, learning and competing in this world of Robotics.

#ExecutingInnovation

A small peak inside the world of Team DJS Robocon as we make new ground breaking bots each year. There’s only way to get a better view ✨✨

#ExecutingInnovation

DJS ROBOCON⚙️
 _Simplify. Solve. Automate_

The official Robotics team of D J Sanghvi College of Engineering and have done it all, from 🛠mechanics to 🔋electronics, 👩‍💻coding to Simulations , and 💸marketing to 🖌️creatives, and we'll keep doing it!

In DD Robocon, our team received an AIR 9 and a 100/100 score in Stage 1 🔥🔥🔥.

Join us to be a part of a great experience in designing robots that compete against 20+ Asian countries in the fierce competition ABU ROBOCON!

Take advantage of this opportunity to Learn, Explore, and Compete in the World of Robots, a journey that will lead you to your best!

DJS Robocon is looking for robot enthusiasts to take part in ABU Robocon 2023.

Departments :
📍Coding 
📍 Electronics
📍Mechanical + Simulations
📍Marketing

Interview Dates:
1st and 2nd December, 2022

Last date of registration: 30th November, 2022

For the interviews, registration link in bio

For any queries feel free to contact ☺️
Dhruvi Shah- 9820003342
Kush Shah - 9022556427

#ExecutingInnovation

MATLAB Challenge Final • With testing and prototyping completed, our team finalised the designs and mechanisms for this year's bot, and our simulation department began final validation.

Following final validation, Stateflow and other MATLAB tools were used to control the bot and visualise the movements and actions that it was supposed to perform.

#nationalddrobocon #matlab #mathworks 
#ExecutingInnovation #hereatdjsce
@mathworks @freshlimesodasalt @djsce.official

Here we go!!!

Stage 2 results of DD Robocon 2022 are out and we are pleased to inform that DJS Robocon has qualified for the third round with a score of 97/100 🥳

The team deserves credit for achieving this goal with dedication and hard work 💪

A huge thank you to all our Faculty, HODs and Principal Sir for their support in our journey so far 🙌

#ExecutingInnovation

We are absolutely delighted to present to you our bots, that bagged us the "AIR 9" in DD Robocon 2020-21 & Rank 2nd in Mumbai🔥

It was only because of the sheer hardwork and persistence of the team that we were able to  achieve this feat 💯

A formal unveiling event was carried out in our college premises in the presence of our faculty, management, mentors and fellow batchmates 👨🏻‍🎓

Seeing our passion for robotics and many newer faces, lets make the remark of ExecutingInnovarion✨

#unveiling #robot2021 #robotics #ExecutingInnovation

We present to you: 
The newest addition to our DJS ROBOCON 2022-23 family! 

Welcome to the team!
We now look forward to a great collaboration with the recruits where we all make a move towards exploring, learning and competing in this world of Robotics.✨

#ExecutingInnovation

Let's make our way to glory together at 📍 DJSCE Lobby 

#unveiling #ddrobocon2022 #executinginnovation #robotics #robot #technology #engineering #robots #arduino #electronics #automation #tech #artificialintelligence #innovation #ai #raspberrypi #coding #stem #iot #programming #science #engineer #electricalengineering #robotic #machinelearning #robotica #electrical #arduinouno #education #manufacturing 

Video Credit: @niraj._.dalal

After one year of hardwork, bagging an AIR 9 in DD Robocon 2020-2021, DJS Robocon is finally unveiling our bot that led us achieve this glory! Right from the prototyping, the mechanisms performed, the challenges faced to the actual live task performance, yes you heard it right, we would love to share everything with you'll!

We would love to see in large number, as we take you with us on this beautiful ride of nostalgia.

📍Location : D J SANGHVI LOBBY

DJS Robocon is back with its recruitment drive in order to participate in the DD Robocon 2022-2023 for Fe’s & Se’s much bigger and much stronger!!! 

Everyone knows that "Robotics is the future" and the person who keeps up with the trend from early on will definitely have an edge throught.

So if you think you have the zeal, the enthusiasm coupled with dedication, strong fundamentals and an eagerness to learn, we would love to see you on in the interviews 

For registration, link in bio

The much-anticipated moment has arrived ! 
The results for DD Robocon Stage-1 are out 🥳
We're all eager for Stage 2 with a goal to expand and soar higher

#ddrobocon #ddrobocon2022 #ExecutingInnovation #aburobocon #aburobocon2022
#explore #trendingreels #explorepage #trending #RoboticsIndia

A sneak peak into our previous bots and their live demonstrations for a fresh problem statement each year.

With each competition that we take part in, we try to innovate something new in the world of robotics. The team leaves a legacy of love, respect, hardwork and dedication each year and we hope to carry it forward with better results each year.
